Agree.name: Agree
Agree.explained: I agree to the proposal as it currently stands

Reservations.name: Reservations
Reservations.explained: I do not oppose the proposal but I wish to register reservations in the result of the call

Standaside.name: Standaside
Standaside.explained: I do not oppose the porposal but I do not support it either: I won't spend energy into implementing it

Principled objection.name: Principled objection
Principled objection.explained: I oppose the proposal but I commit to work with the proposing party to find a solution that works for all
